news_header: The meeting between US and Russian Foreign Ministers in Saudi Arabia aims to facilitate potential peace negotiations for Ukraine, although Ukraine itself is not included.
news_original_title: Merkittävin kohtaaminen lähes kolmeen vuoteen – tästä Yhdysvaltain ja Venäjän tapaamisessa on kyse
news_text: This marks a shift in US-Russia relations as the US previously sought to isolate Russia during its aggression in Ukraine. The last meeting of the foreign ministers was nearly two years ago and did not yield significant progress. The current talks are expected to address the situation in Ukraine, but the Ukrainian government has not been invited to participate.
